item.title: St. Louis Park
item.description: Cyclocross is finally1 here. Here being Minnesota where I’ve been for the past six weeks or so for the summer. With cyclocross season just around the corner in Germany, I was stoked to be able give my legs a warm start into the coming race season by entering the first of six Tuesday Night CX races held around the suburbs of Minneapolis. An 18:00 start with temperatures at 26Â°C (80Â°F) and humidity of 46% ðŸ¥µ was in complete contrast to what I’m used to cyclocross racing in Europe.
